attributes.action: Ensure that  Ryan Herbert & Brendan Harris serve their full minimum terms.
attributes.background: The murder of Sophie Lancaster in 2007  was not just an attack on a human being but an attack on a whole community of ‘alternative’ subcultures and leniency  is inappropriate in order to send a strong message that such pointless hatred is unacceptable in our society

rejection.details: The responsibility for release on licence or parole in individual cases rests ultimately with the Secretary of State for Justice, to whom parole boards are answerable, and not the Government as a whole.
